snippet: Masahiro Tanaka, scheduled to pitch Tuesday, will now pitch the day game Wednesday. Michael Pineda will start the night game for the Yankees.
abstract: New York Yankees, following rainout, prepare for doubleheader against the Chicago Cubs in which they hope to showcase their two youngest pitchers, Masahiro Tanaka and Michael Pineda.
lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka, scheduled to pitch Tuesday, will now pitch the day game Wednesday. Michael Pineda will start the night game for the Yankees.
